title: 救命啊！ 服务器在进行tick循环时发生异常 (Ex...咋整
author: Darkfanzi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wjwrh 于 2020-6-26 07:26 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// My bad.
Time: 6/25/20 8:17 PMDescription: 服务器在进行tick循环时发生异常 (Exception in server tick loop)
com.google.gson.JsonParseException: java.io.EOFException: End of input at line 1 column 1 path $        at net.minecraft.util.JsonUtils.func_193838_a(SourceFile:506)        at net.minecraft.util.JsonUtils.func_193841_a(SourceFile:522)        at net.minecraft.server.management.UserList.func_152679_g(UserList.java:198)        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedPlayerList.func_187246_z(SourceFile:99)        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedPlayerList.<init>(SourceFile:25)        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:226)        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:587)        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)Caused by: java.io.EOFException: End of input at line 1 column 1 path $        at com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader.nextNonWhitespace(JsonReader.java:1393)        at com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader.doPeek(JsonReader.java:549)        at com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader.peek(JsonReader.java:425)        at com.google.gson.internal.bind.CollectionTypeAdapterFactory$Adapter.read(CollectionTypeAdapterFactory.java:74)        at com.google.gson.internal.bind.CollectionTypeAdapterFactory$Adapter.read(CollectionTypeAdapterFactory.java:61)        at net.minecraft.util.JsonUtils.func_193838_a(SourceFile:504)        ... 7 more

有啥修复方法嘛。。。。我几个月的成果都在这了 难受啊啊啊！！还有之前那些解决贴都打不开了是怎么回事

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
服务器根目录下的某个记录玩家信息的json文件损坏
建议备份之后删除重新生成
可能为banned-ips.json 或 banned-players.json

replies.author: Darkfanzi
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2020-6-25 22:57

非常感谢！
